bug.author: opencv-pushbot
bug.summary: doc/CMakeLists.txt does not build opencv_contrib (EXTRA_MODULES) tutorials
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/3920>http://code.opencv.org/issues/3920</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Andreas Bihlmaier on 2014-09-25 15:57 || Priority: Normal || Affected: branch '2.4' (2.4-dev) || Category: build/install || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: || PR: || Platform: Any / Any </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>doc/CMakeLists.txt does not build opencv_contrib (EXTRA_MODULES) tutorials</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>doc/CMakeLists.txt automatically includes opencv_contrib modules (${EXTRA_MODULES}) for make html_docs, but leaves out their tutorials (i.e. https://github.com/Itseez/opencv_contrib/tree/master/doc/tutorials). </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>Andreas Bihlmaier on 2014-09-25 15:59</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>See related discussion at https://github.com/Itseez/opencv_contrib/pull/97 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h5>Vladislav Vinogradov on 2014-09-30 09:51</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Vadim, could you look at this? - Assignee set to Vadim Pisarevsky - Status changed from New to Open - Category set to build/install </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: There is no support for opencv_contrib in 2.4. All is fine in master branch: <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/master/d3/d81/tutorial_contrib_root.html>http://docs.opencv.org/master/d3/d81/tutorial_contrib_root.html</denchmark-link>
